targets.expr:
# sum by (server) (rate(k6_http_reqs_total{server=~"$server", group="::Main page"}[$my_rate_interval]))
sum by (server) (rate(k6_http_reqs_total{server=~"$server", error_code=""}[$my_rate_interval]))

# sum by (server) (k6_checks_rate)

# (
#   sum by (server) (rate(k6_http_req_failed{server=~"$server"}[$__rate_interval]))
# /
#   sum by (server) (rate(k6_http_reqs{server=~"$server"}[$__rate_interval]))
# ) * 100 or vector(0)

# avg by (server) (k6_http_req_failed_rate{error!="", server=~"$server"} or vector(0))

# avg by (server) (1-k6_checks_rate{server=~"$server"})

# sum(rate(k6_http_req_failed_total[5m])) / sum(rate(k6_http_reqs_total[5m]))

# sum by (server) (k6_http_reqs_total{error!=""})

# Client error rate
# (
#   (
#     sum by (server) (rate(k6_http_reqs_total{error!="", server=~"$server"}[$my_rate_interval]))
#   )
#   or on(server)
#   (
#     sum by (server) (rate(k6_http_reqs_total{server=~"$server"}[$my_rate_interval])) * 0
#   )
# )
# /
# (
#   sum by (server) (rate(k6_http_reqs_total{server=~"$server"}[$my_rate_interval]))
# )

1-
(
  (
    sum by (server) (rate(k6_http_reqs_total{error_code!="", server=~"$server"}[$my_rate_interval]))
  )
  or on(server)
  (
    sum by (server) (rate(k6_http_reqs_total{server=~"$server"}[$my_rate_interval])) * 0
  )
)
/
(
  sum by (server) (rate(k6_http_reqs_total{server=~"$server"}[$my_rate_interval]))
)

# (
#   sum by (server) (rate(nginx_http_response_count_total{status=~"5xx"}[$__rate_interval]))
#   or
#   # This part creates a zero-value series for every server that has *any* traffic
#   (sum by (server) (rate(nginx_http_response_count_total[$__rate_interval])) * 0)
# )
# /
# sum by (server) (rate(nginx_http_response_count_total[$__rate_interval]))

# Nginx error rate
# (
#   (
#     sum by (server) (rate(nginx_http_response_count_total{status=~"^[45]..", server=~"$server"}[$my_rate_interval]))
#   )
#   or on(server)
#   (
#     sum by (server) (rate(nginx_http_response_count_total{server=~"$server"}[$my_rate_interval])) * 0
#   )
# )
# /
# (
#   sum by (server) (rate(nginx_http_response_count_total{server=~"$server"}[$my_rate_interval]))
# )

1-
(
  (
    sum by (server) (rate(nginx_http_response_count_total{status=~"^[45]..", server=~"$server"}[$my_rate_interval]))
  )
  or on(server)
  (
    sum by (server) (rate(nginx_http_response_count_total{server=~"$server"}[$my_rate_interval])) * 0
  )
)
/
(
  sum by (server) (rate(nginx_http_response_count_total{server=~"$server"}[$my_rate_interval]))
)

# sum by (server) (rate(k6_http_reqs_total{server=~"$server", group="::Main page"}[$my_rate_interval]))
sum by (server) (rate(k6_http_reqs_total{server=~"$server"}[$my_rate_interval]))

# sum by (server) (rate(nginx_http_response_count_total[$__rate_interval]))

# sum by (server) (rate(nginx_http_response_count_total{status=~"^[45].."}[$__rate_interval]))

(
  sum by (server) (rate(nginx_http_response_count_total{status=~"^[45].."}[$__rate_interval]))
)
or on(server)
(
  sum by (server) (rate(nginx_http_response_count_total[$__rate_interval])) * 0
)
